scripts.dev:all: npm run dev --workspace=site & npm run dev --workspace=extension
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=tas && npm run build --workspace=site && npm run build --workspace=extension && npm run build --workspace=native
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run --workspace=site && npm run test:run --workspace=extension && npm run test:run --workspace=tas && npm run test:run --workspace=native
scripts.tc: npm run build --workspace=tas && tsc --noEmit && npm run tc --workspace=site && npm run tc --workspace=extension && npm run typecheck --workspace=native
scripts.lint: npm run tc && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:eslint:fix && npm run lint:eslint:fix --workspace=site && npm run lint:eslint:fix --workspace=extension && npm run lint:eslint:fix --workspace=tas && npm run lint:eslint:fix --workspace=native
scripts.lint:all: npm run tc && npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint --workspace=site && npm run lint --workspace=extension && npm run lint --workspace=tas && npm run lint --workspace=native
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format --workspace=site && npm run format --workspace=extension && npm run format --workspace=tas && npm run format --workspace=native
scripts.format:check:all: npm run format:check && npm run format:check --workspace=site && npm run format:check --workspace=extension && npm run format:check --workspace=tas && npm run format:check --workspace=native
scripts.prep: npm run format:all && npm run lint:fix && npm run lint:all && npm run test:all
scripts.depcheck: depcheck site --ignores='@tab-app-switcher/*,postcss,tailwindcss,autoprefixer,@vitejs/*' && depcheck extension --ignores='@tab-app-switcher/*,postcss,tailwindcss,autoprefixer,wxt' && depcheck tas --ignores='@tab-app-switcher/*,postcss,tailwindcss,autoprefixer,tailwindcss-animate' && depcheck packages/ui --ignores='postcss,tailwindcss,autoprefixer' && depcheck native --ignores='@tab-app-switcher/*,postcss,tailwindcss,autoprefixer,electron,electron-builder'
